description: This file implements signature verification logic for cryptographic validation using OpenSSL in C. It includes functions to read files, load public keys, verify RSA signatures, and a main validation function called verifySignature that verifies the signature of a file against a public key.

methods.name: void * readFileContents(const char * fileName,uint32_t * fileLen)
methods.description: Reads the contents of a file into memory and returns the buffer, setting the file length. Handles file opening, reading, and error management.

methods.name: EVP_PKEY * loadPublicKey(void * publicKeyContents,uint32_t publicKeyContentsLen)
methods.description: Loads an RSA public key from memory buffer using OpenSSL's PEM decoding functions.

methods.name: bool RSAVerifySignature(EVP_PKEY * pubKey,void * digest,uint32_t digestLen,void * data,uint32_t dataLen)
methods.description: Performs RSA signature verification using SHA-256 digest with OpenSSL EVP API.

methods.name: bool verifySignature(char * keyFilename,char * baseFilename,char * signatureFilename)
methods.description: Main function to verify the signature of a file against a public key and its signature file.

ctags.name: RSAVerifySignature
ctags.pattern: /^static bool RSAVerifySignature(EVP_PKEY *pubKey, void *digest, uint32_t digestLen, void *data, u/
